comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Science, Technology, History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: Could I also point out that his name was Roderick, not Ronald and the image is, in the Oxford DNB, credit to Camille Silvy with a date of 1860. www.oxforddnb.com./view/article/19555?docPos=3
